name: Jeff Emmett
description: Jeff's work includes papers such as "Challenges & Approaches to Scaling the Commons" and "MycoFi: Mycelial Design Patterns for Web3 & Beyond." Exploring the frontiers of decentralized governance and economic systems, Jeff draws inspiration from natural systems and applies these lessons to the socio-economic realm. His work not only advances the field of token engineering but also inspires a new generation of thinkers and builders in the pursuit of sustainable and inclusive digital commons.
